text: رَبَّنَا لَا تَجۡعَلۡنَا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا رَبَّنَآۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

translation.en: Our Lord, make us not [objects of] torment for the disbelievers and forgive us, our Lord. Indeed, it is You who is the Exalted in Might, the Wise
translation.id: Ya Tuhan kami, janganlah Engkau jadikan kami (sasaran) fitnah bagi orang-orang kafir. Dan ampunilah kami, ya Tuhan kami. Sesungguhnya Engkau Żat Yang Mahaperkasa, Mahabijaksana

translation.en: She that is to be examined
